discussion.content:
Sign in to the Azure portal.
Navigate to the Key Vaults section and select the key vault named KV12345678.
In the key vault settings, navigate to the Access policies section.
Click on Add Access Policy.
In the Configure from template dropdown, select the Secret Management template.
In the Select principal field, enter the name of the Azure Resource Manager’s service principal.
Ensure that the Get and List permissions are checked under the Secret permissions.
Click on Add to add the access policy.
Finally, click on Save to save the changes to the key vault’s access policies.
